attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harry Patch, aged 109, is the last surviving British Tommy from the trench warfare of WW1. A veteran of the Battle of Passchendaele, Harry has previously been knighted by the king of Belgium, but not by our queen. At the age of 109, clearly time is pressing for Britain to show him how much we appreciate him.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
